verses.verse: וַיִּקְח֣וּ <WH3947> vai-yik-Chu took בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- the sons אַ֠הֲרֹן <WH175> 'A-ha-ron of Aaron נָדָ֨ב <WH5070> na-Dav And Nadab וַאֲבִיה֜וּא <WH30> va-'a-vi-Hu and Abihu אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> 'ish either מַחְתָּת֗וֹ <WH4289> mach-ta-To, of them his censer וַיִּתְּנ֤וּ <WH5414> vai-yit-te-Nu and put בָהֵן֙ <WH2004> va-Hen therein אֵ֔שׁ <WH784> 'Esh, fire וַיָּשִׂ֥ימוּ <WH7760> vai-ya-Si-mu and put עָלֶ֖יהָ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-ha and קְטֹ֑רֶת <WH7004> ke-To-ret; incense וַיַּקְרִ֜בוּ <WH7126> vai-yak-Ri-vu thereon and offered לִפְנֵ֤י <WH6440> lif-Nei before יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD אֵ֣שׁ <WH784> 'esh fire זָרָ֔ה <WH2114> za-Rah, strange אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which לֹ֦א <WH3808> lo had not צִוָּ֖ה <WH6680> tziv-Vah which he commanded אֹתָֽם׃ <WH853> 'o-Tam.

וַתֵּ֥צֵא <WH3318> vat-Te-tze And there went out אֵ֛שׁ <WH784> 'esh fire מִלִּפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> mil-lif-Nei before יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh from the LORD וַתֹּ֣אכַל <WH398> vat-To-chal and devoured אוֹתָ֑ם <WH853> o-Tam; וַיָּמֻ֖תוּ <WH4191> vai-ya-Mu-tu them and they died לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> lif-Nei before יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. the LORD

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said מֹשֶׁ֜ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh Then Moses אֶֽל־ <WH413> 'el- to אַהֲרֹ֗ן <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron, unto Aaron הוּא֩ <WH1931> hu It אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- is what דִּבֶּ֨ר <WH1696> dib-Ber spake יְהוָ֤ה׀ <WH3068> Yah-weh This [is it] that the LORD לֵאמֹר֙ <WH559> le-Mor saying בִּקְרֹבַ֣י <WH7138> bik-ro-Vai in them that come nigh אֶקָּדֵ֔שׁ <WH6942> 'ek-ka-Desh, I will be sanctified וְעַל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- and פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> pe-Nei me and before כָל־ <WH3605> chol all הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> ha-'Am all the people אֶכָּבֵ֑ד <WH3513> 'ek-ka-Ved; I will be glorified וַיִּדֹּ֖ם <WH1826> vai-yid-Dom held his peace אַהֲרֹֽן׃ <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron. And Aaron

וַיִּקְרָ֣א <WH7121> vai-yik-Ra called מֹשֶׁ֗ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh, And Moses אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to מִֽישָׁאֵל֙ <WH4332> mi-sha-'El Mishael וְאֶ֣ל <WH413> ve-'El and אֶלְצָפָ֔ן <WH469> 'el-tza-Fan, and Elzaphan בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei the sons עֻזִּיאֵ֖ל <WH5816> 'uz-zi-'El of Uzziel דֹּ֣ד <WH1730> dod the uncle אַהֲרֹ֑ן <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron; of Aaron וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer and said אֲלֵהֶ֗ם <WH413> 'a-le-Hem, to קִ֠רְב֞וּ <WH7126> kir-Vu unto them Come near שְׂא֤וּ <WH5375> se-'U carry אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֲחֵיכֶם֙ <WH251> 'a-chei-Chem your brethren מֵאֵ֣ת <WH853> me-'Et פְּנֵי־ <WH6440> pe-nei- from before הַקֹּ֔דֶשׁ <WH6944> hak-Ko-desh, the sanctuary אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about מִח֖וּץ <WH2351> mi-Chutz out לַֽמַּחֲנֶֽה׃ <WH4264> Lam-ma-cha-Neh. of the camp

וַֽיִּקְרְב֗וּ <WH7126> vai-yik-re-Vu, So they went near וַיִּשָּׂאֻם֙ <WH5375> vai-yis-sa-'Um and carried בְּכֻתֳּנֹתָ֔ם <WH3801> be-chut-to-no-Tam, them in their coats אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about מִח֖וּץ <WH2351> mi-Chutz out לַֽמַּחֲנֶ֑ה <WH4264> lam-ma-cha-Neh; of the camp כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher after דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> dib-Ber had said מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> mo-Sheh. as Moses

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said מֹשֶׁ֣ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh And Moses אֶֽל־ <WH413> 'el- to אַהֲרֹ֡ן <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron unto Aaron וּלְאֶלְעָזָר֩ <WH499> u-le-'el-'a-Zar and unto Eleazar וּלְאִֽיתָמָ֨ר׀ <WH385> u-le-'i-ta-Mar and unto Ithamar בָּנָ֜יו <WH1121> ba-Nav his sons רָֽאשֵׁיכֶ֥ם <WH7218> ra-shei-Chem not your heads אַל־ <WH408> 'al- not תִּפְרָ֣עוּ׀ <WH6544> tif-Ra-'u Uncover וּבִגְדֵיכֶ֤ם <WH899> u-vig-dei-Chem your clothes לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- nor תִפְרֹ֙מוּ֙ <WH6533> tif-Ro-mu neither rend וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> ve-Lo nor תָמֻ֔תוּ <WH4191> ta-Mu-tu, lest ye die וְעַ֥ל <WH5921> ve-'Al against כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הָעֵדָ֖ה <WH5712> ha-'e-Dah come upon all the people יִקְצֹ֑ף <WH7107> yik-Tzof; and lest wrath וַאֲחֵיכֶם֙ <WH251> va-'a-chei-Chem but let your brethren כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- the whole בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> beit the whole house יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel יִבְכּוּ֙ <WH1058> yiv-Ku bewail אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַשְּׂרֵפָ֔ה <WH8316> has-se-re-Fah, the burning אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which שָׂרַ֥ף <WH8313> sa-Raf hath kindled יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. which the LORD

וּמִפֶּתַח֩ <WH6607> u-mip-pe-Tach from the door אֹ֨הֶל <WH168> 'O-hel of the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֜ד <WH4150> mo-'Ed of the congregation לֹ֤א <WH3808> lo even תֵֽצְאוּ֙ <WH3318> te-tze-'U And ye shall not go out פֶּן־ <WH6435> pen- or תָּמֻ֔תוּ <WH4191> ta-Mu-tu, lest ye die כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- for שֶׁ֛מֶן <WH8081> She-men oil מִשְׁחַ֥ת <WH4888> mish-Chat for the anointing יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD עֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <WH5921> 'a-lei-Chem; and וַֽיַּעֲשׂ֖וּ <WH6213> vai-ya-'a-Su [is] upon you And they did כִּדְבַ֥ר <WH1697> kid-Var according to the word מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> mo-Sheh. of Moses פ Peh
וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָ֔ה <WH3069> Yah-weh, God אֶֽל־ <WH413> 'el- to אַהֲרֹ֖ן <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron unto Aaron לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. saying

יַ֣יִן <WH3196> Ya-yin wine וְשֵׁכָ֞ר <WH7941> ve-she-Char nor strong drink אַל־ <WH408> 'al- nor תֵּ֣שְׁתְּ׀ <WH8354> Te-shet Do not drink אַתָּ֣ה׀ <WH859> 'at-Tah you וּבָנֶ֣יךָ <WH1121> u-va-Nei-cha thou nor thy sons אִתָּ֗ךְ <WH854> 'it-Tach, for בְּבֹאֲכֶ֛ם <WH935> be-vo-'a-Chem with thee when ye go אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- into אֹ֥הֶל <WH168> 'O-hel into the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֖ד <WH4150> mo-'Ed of the congregation וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> ve-Lo you will not תָמֻ֑תוּ <WH4191> ta-Mu-tu; lest ye die חֻקַּ֥ת <WH2708> chuk-Kat [it shall be] a statute עוֹלָ֖ם <WH5769> o-Lam for ever לְדֹרֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH1755> le-do-ro-tei-Chem. throughout your generations

וּֽלֲהַבְדִּ֔יל <WH914> u-la-hav-Dil, And that ye may put difference בֵּ֥ין <WH996> bein between הַקֹּ֖דֶשׁ <WH6944> hak-Ko-desh between holy וּבֵ֣ין <WH996> u-Vein and between הַחֹ֑ל <WH2455> ha-Chol; and unholy וּבֵ֥ין <WH996> u-Vein between הַטָּמֵ֖א <WH2931> hat-ta-Me and between unclean וּבֵ֥ין <WH996> u-Vein between הַטָּהֽוֹר׃ <WH2889> hat-ta-Hor. and clean

וּלְהוֹרֹ֖ת <WH3384> u-le-ho-Rot And that ye may teach אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel אֵ֚ת <WH853> 'et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הַ֣חֻקִּ֔ים <WH2706> ha-chuk-Kim, all the statutes אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which דִּבֶּ֧ר <WH1696> dib-Ber hath spoken יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Yah-weh which the LORD אֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH413> 'a-lei-Hem to בְּיַד־ <WH3027> be-yad- unto them by the hand מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> mo-Sheh. of Moses פ Peh

וַיְדַבֵּ֨ר <WH1696> vay-dab-Ber spake מֹשֶׁ֜ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh And Moses אֶֽל־ <WH413> 'el- to אַהֲרֹ֗ן <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron, unto Aaron וְאֶ֣ל <WH413> ve-'El about אֶ֠לְעָזָר <WH499> 'El-'a-zor and unto Eleazar וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- and אִ֨יתָמָ֥ר׀ <WH385> 'i-ta-Mar and unto Ithamar בָּנָיו֮ <WH1121> ba-Nav his sons הַנּֽוֹתָרִים֒ <WH3498> han-no-ta-Rim that were left קְח֣וּ <WH3947> ke-Chu Take אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַמִּנְחָ֗ה <WH4503> ham-min-Chah, the meat offering הַנּוֹתֶ֙רֶת֙ <WH3498> han-no-Te-ret that remaineth מֵאִשֵּׁ֣י <WH801> me-'ish-Shei made by fire יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, of the LORD וְאִכְל֥וּהָ <WH398> ve-'ich-Lu-ha and eat מַצּ֖וֹת <WH4682> matz-Tzot it without leaven אֵ֣צֶל <WH681> 'E-tzel beside הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חַ <WH4196> ham-miz-Be-ach; the altar כִּ֛י <WH3588> ki for קֹ֥דֶשׁ <WH6944> Ko-desh for it [is] most קָֽדָשִׁ֖ים <WH6944> ka-da-Shim holy הִֽוא׃ <WH1931> hi You

וַאֲכַלְתֶּ֤ם <WH398> va-'a-chal-Tem And ye shall eat אֹתָהּ֙ <WH853> 'o-Tah בְּמָק֣וֹם <WH4725> be-ma-Kom place קָדֹ֔שׁ <WH6918> ka-Dosh, it in the holy כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki because חָקְךָ֤ <WH2706> cha-ke-Cha because it [is] thy due וְחָק־ <WH2706> ve-chok- due בָּנֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH1121> ba-Nei-cha and thy sons' הִ֔וא <WH1931> hi he מֵאִשֵּׁ֖י <WH801> me-'ish-Shei made by fire יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; of the LORD כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- because כֵ֖ן <WH3651> chen thus צֻוֵּֽיתִי׃ <WH6680> tzuv-Vei-ti. for so I am commanded

וְאֵת֩ <WH853> ve-'Et חֲזֵ֨ה <WH2373> cha-Zeh breast הַתְּנוּפָ֜ה <WH8573> hat-te-nu-Fah And the wave וְאֵ֣ת׀ <WH853> ve-'Et שׁ֣וֹק <WH7785> Shok shoulder הַתְּרוּמָ֗ה <WH8641> hat-te-ru-Mah, and heave תֹּֽאכְלוּ֙ <WH398> to-che-Lu shall ye eat בְּמָק֣וֹם <WH4725> be-ma-Kom place טָה֔וֹר <WH2889> ta-Hor, in a clean אַתָּ֕ה <WH859> 'at-Tah you וּבָנֶ֥יךָ <WH1121> u-va-Nei-cha thou and thy sons וּבְנֹתֶ֖יךָ <WH1323> u-ve-no-Tei-cha and thy daughters אִתָּ֑ךְ <WH854> 'it-Tach; for כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- as חָקְךָ֤ <WH2706> cha-ke-Cha with thee for [they be] thy due וְחָק־ <WH2706> ve-chok- due בָּנֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH1121> ba-Nei-cha and thy sons' נִתְּנ֔וּ <WH5414> nit-te-Nu, [which] are given מִזִּבְחֵ֥י <WH2077> miz-ziv-Chei out of the sacrifices שַׁלְמֵ֖י <WH8002> shal-Mei of peace offerings בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

שׁ֣וֹק <WH7785> Shok shoulder הַתְּרוּמָ֞ה <WH8641> hat-te-ru-Mah The heave וַחֲזֵ֣ה <WH2373> va-cha-Zeh breast הַתְּנוּפָ֗ה <WH8573> hat-te-nu-Fah, and the wave עַ֣ל <WH5921> 'al along אִשֵּׁ֤י <WH801> 'ish-Shei with the offerings made by fire הַחֲלָבִים֙ <WH2459> ha-cha-la-Vim of the fat יָבִ֔יאוּ <WH935> ya-Vi-'u, shall they bring לְהָנִ֥יף <WH5130> le-ha-Nif to wave תְּנוּפָ֖ה <WH8573> te-nu-Fah [it for] a wave offering לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> lif-Nei before יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; the LORD וְהָיָ֨ה <WH1961> ve-ha-Yah become לְךָ֜ le-Cha וּלְבָנֶ֤יךָ <WH1121> u-le-va-Nei-cha and it shall be thine and thy sons' אִתְּךָ֙ <WH854> 'it-te-Cha for לְחָק־ <WH2706> le-chok- with thee by a statute עוֹלָ֔ם <WH5769> o-Lam, for ever כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher after צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> tziv-Vah hath commanded יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. as the LORD

הֵ֚ן <WH2005> hen Behold לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- had not הוּבָ֣א <WH935> hu-Va of it was not brought אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- דָּמָ֔הּ <WH1818> da-Mah, the blood אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- into הַקֹּ֖דֶשׁ <WH6944> hak-Ko-desh the holy פְּנִ֑ימָה <WH6441> pe-Ni-mah; in within אָכ֨וֹל <WH398> a-Chol [place] ye should indeed תֹּאכְל֥וּ <WH398> to-che-Lu have eaten אֹתָ֛הּ <WH853> 'o-Tah בַּקֹּ֖דֶשׁ <WH6944> bak-Ko-desh it in the holy כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher I צִוֵּֽיתִי׃ <WH6680> tziv-Vei-ti.
